title: LNG Regasification Planning
description: An operator at an LNG import terminal plans the regasification schedule to meet the daily demand from the downstream gas pipeline.

tasks.description: Retrieve the gas demand nomination from the pipeline operator for the next 24 hours.
tasks.expected_outcome: The required volume of natural gas to be sent out is identified.

tasks.description: Calculate the amount of LNG that needs to be pumped from the storage tanks and vaporized to meet the demand.
tasks.expected_outcome: The required LNG volume and flow rate are calculated.

tasks.description: Set the schedule in the terminal's control system to automatically manage the LNG pumps and vaporizers.
tasks.expected_outcome: The regasification process is scheduled and automated in the DCS.
